title: Advanced Slope Failure Investigations
description: Experience the ultimate luxury living with breathtaking ocean views in this stunning beach house located in Malibu.
shortDescription: Luxury beach house with breathtaking ocean views in Malibu, California.

images.caption: Failure of the Highway Slope along I220s in Jackson, MS
3D LiDAR Point Cloud to Monitor Slope Movement
3D  ERI results of thee Failed Highway Slope

descriptionArray: Multiple Highway slope has been investigated using Advanced landslide investigation method using ERI, LiDAR and Drone Technology
The extent and depth of the failure was determined using LiDAR point cloud.
The moisture variations and release of pore water pressure was evaluated using 3D ERI profile.

title: Investigation of Seepage Location in Levee Section
description: Escape to this cozy mountain retreat nestled in the heart of Aspen, Colorado. Enjoy skiing, hiking, and relaxation in this beautiful cabin.
shortDescription: Cozy mountain retreat in Aspen, Colorado.

images.caption: Layout of the ERI lines at the Top of Levee Section

descriptionArray: ERI results are effectively utilized to determine the locations of the Seepage Locations within the levee sections.
Confirmatory Soil Drilling was performed based on ERI test results.
